    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1135</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Leyendas</string>
            <string language="en">Legends</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Legenden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Légendes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Legendas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Leggende</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μύθοι</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Guia de lectura interactiva de les narracions "El Monte de las Ánimas", "El Miserere" y "Los ojos verdes", de Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer, tres llegendes representatives del gust dels autors romàntics i post-romàntics per aquest gènere. Consta de les  seccions següents: "¿Quién lo ha escrito?" (amb informació sobre l'autor i enllaços), "Antes de leer" (amb indicacions prèvies a la lectura), "Comprensión" (amb un test autoavaluatiu de resposta múltiple) i "Después de leer" (amb exercicis interactius sobre lèxic, gramàtica i comprensió lectora).</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive reading guide for three legends: Mountain of Souls, Miserere and Green Eyes by Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer. The three tales are representative of Romantic and Post-Romantic authors fondness for this genre. The unit is divided into three sections: "Who wrote it?" (information on the author and links), "Before reading" (pre-reading suggestions), "While reading" (multiple-choice self-assessment test), and "After reading" (interactive exercises on vocabulary, grammar and reading comprehension).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">segle XIX</string>
            <string language="en">19th century</string>
            <string language="es">siglo XIX</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llegenda</string>
            <string language="en">legend</string>
            <string language="es">leyenda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història de la literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literary history</string>
            <string language="es">historia de la literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Leseanleitung für drei Legenden: 
"Berg von Seelen", "von Miserere" und "von grünen Augen" durch 
Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer. Die drei Geschichten sind Repräsentant
des Fondness der romantischen und Pfosten-Romantischen Autoren für 
dieses Genren. Die Maßeinheit ist in drei Kapitel unterteilt: 
"wer schrieb sie?" (Informationen über den Autor und 
Links), "vor Messwert" (Vormesswertvorschläge), ", beim Ablesen" 
(Mehrfachwahl Selbstbewertung Test) und ", nach Messwert" (interaktive
Übungen auf Wortschatz-, Grammatik- und Leseerfassen).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guide interactif de lecture pour trois légendes 
: "montagne des âmes", du "Miserere" et "des yeux verts" par 
Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer. Les trois contes sont représentant du 
penchant des auteurs romantiques et Poteau-Romantiques pour ce genre. 
L'unité est divisée en trois sections : "qui l'a 
écrite?" (l'information sur l'auteur et liens), "avant la 
lecture" (suggestions de pré-lecture), "tout en lisant" (essai de 
multiple-choix art de l'auto-portrait-assessment), et "après la lecture" (exercices
interactifs sur la compréhension de vocabulaire, de grammaire et de 
lecture).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guia interativa da leitura para três legendas: 
"montanha das almas", do "Miserere" e "dos olhos verdes" por 
Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer. Os três tales são representante do 
fondness dos autores românticos e Borne-Românticos para este genre. 
A unidade é dividida em três seções: "quem a 
escreveu?" (informação no autor e ligações), "antes da 
leitura" (sugestões da pre-leitura), "ao ler" (teste do 
self-assessment da múltiplo-escolha), e "após a leitura" 
(exercícios interativos na compreensão do vocabulário, da 
gramática e da leitura).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guida interattiva della lettura per tre leggende:
"montagna delle anime", "di Miserere" e "degli occhi verdi" da 
Gustavo Adolfo Bécquer. I tre racconti sono rappresentante di 
fondness degli autori romantici ed Alberino-Romantici per questo 
genere. L'unità è divisa in tre sezioni: "chi la ha
scritta?" (le informazioni sull'autore e collegamenti), "prima 
di lettura" (suggerimenti della pre-lettura), "mentre leggendo" (prova
di valutazione di se stesso di multiplo-scelta) e "dopo la lettura" 
(esercitazioni interattive su comprensione di vocabolario, di 
grammatica e della lettura).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικός οδηγός ανάγνωσης για τρεις μύθους: 
"Βουνό των ψυχών", "Miserere" και των "πράσινων ματιών" 
από το Gustavo Adolfo Bιcquer. Οι τρεις ιστορίες 
είναι αντιπροσωπευτικές fondness των ρομαντικών και 
μετα-ρομαντικών συντακτών για αυτό το ύφος. Η μονάδα 
διαιρείται σε τρία τμήματα: "Ποιος τον έγραψε;" 
(πληροφορίες για το συντάκτη και τις συνδέσεις), "πρίν 
διαβάζει" (προτάσεις προανάγνωσης), "διαβάζοντασ" (πολλαπλής 
επιλογής δοκιμή αυτοαξιολόγησης), και "μετά από να διαβάσει" 
(διαλογικές ασκήσεις στο λεξιλόγιο, τη γραμματική και την 
ανάγνωση της κατανόησης).</string>
          </description>
